A

AbstractDatabase - Class in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.db
Abstract base classes for database objects providing an implementation of the Database.load(com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Logger, com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.Source) operation that is used to load data into or execute scripts against the database.
AbstractDatabase(int) - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.db.AbstractDatabase
Constructor initializes default database port.
AbstractDBUnitLoader - Class in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.ldr.dbunit
Abstract base class for loaders that use DBUnit to load data sets.
AbstractDBUnitLoader() - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.ldr.dbunit.AbstractDBUnitLoader
 
AbstractLoader - Class in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.ldr
Abstract base class for loaders that implements the Loader.isSupported(com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Logger, com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.Source) method.
AbstractLoader() - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.ldr.AbstractLoader
 
AbstractSource - Class in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.mojo
Abstract base class for objects that describe the source files that will be loaded into the in-memory database.
AbstractSource() - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.mojo.AbstractSource
The default constructor.
AbstractSource(String) - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.mojo.AbstractSource
Construct a source object that describes a DDL/DML script or DBUnit data set.
AbstractSQLDatabase - Class in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.db
Abstract base classes embedded SQL databases.
AbstractSQLDatabase(int) - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.db.AbstractSQLDatabase
Constructor initializes default database port.

The message key for the error reported when a source file cannot be read.

The message key for the error reported when an error occurs validating a file.

The prefix used to denote that a resource should be loaded from the classpath rather than the file system.
CLASSPATH_PREFIX_LENGTH - Static variable in class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.ldr.AbstractLoader
The length of the classpath: prefix.
com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb - package com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb
This package contains the interfaces for the databases and loaders.
com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.db - package com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.db
This package and its sub-packages contains the classes that implement database descriptors.
com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.db.derby - package com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.db.derby
This package contains the classes that implement the support for Apache Derby.
com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.db.h2 - package com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.db.h2
This package contains the classes that implement the support for H2.
com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.db.hsqldb - package com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.db.hsqldb
This package contains the classes that implement the support for HSQLDB.
com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.ldr - package com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.ldr
This package contains the classes that implement the loaders.
com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.ldr.dbunit - package com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.ldr.dbunit
This package contains the classes that implement the loaders for DBUnit data sets.
com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.ldr.sqltool - package com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.ldr.sqltool
This package contains the classes that implement the loaders for DDL/DML scripts.
com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.mojo - package com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.mojo
This package contains the classes that implement the plug-in's Mojos.

D

Database - Interface in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb
